snippet: Michael Conway, whose company bought and leased office equipment, was accused of faking agreements with the baseball team to increase financing from investors.
abstract: Michael Conway of Verona, NJ, is arrested and charged with wire fraud and identity theft in connection with fraud scheme involving his company Choice Office Solutions and fake equipment leases.
lead_paragraph: Michael Conway, whose company bought and leased office equipment, was accused of faking agreements with the baseball team to increase financing from investors.

headline.main: Man Charged With Fraud Scheme Involving Forged Mets Officials’ Signatures
